snippet: The loss of the R.M.S. Titanic was commemorated in innumerable ways, including in the print and web pages of the IHT and The New York Times. For you, what was the most memorable story, event or picture?
abstract: The loss of the R.M.S. Titanic was commemorated in innumerable ways, including in the print and web pages of the IHT and The New York Times. For you, what was the most memorable story, event or picture?

headline.main: For You, What Was the Most Affecting Titanic Story, Event or Image?
